mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.mac_id, CONCAT(f.x,'-',f.y) as aisl_xy, f.size as aisle_size, f.stock, f.product_cat_id, f.product_id, f.price, p.`name`, c.`name` AS cat_name FROM food_machine_aisle f LEFT JOIN food_product p ON f.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN food_machine_product_cat c ON f.product_cat_id = c.id where f.mac_id=#{macId}

select t1.id, aisle.id as aisleId, aisle.stock as stock, aisle.price, aisle.product_cat_id as productCatId, product.id as productId,product.name as productName,product.materials as pMaterials, product.show_price as showPrice, product.picture as picture, product.unit as unit, product.zs_weight as zsWeight, product.cp_weight as cpWeight, product.warm_flag as warmFlag, product.warm_time as warmTime, product.hot_num as hotNum, product.label as label, product.`status` as status, product.up_time as upTime, date_add(product.up_time, interval period day) as downTime, product.keyword as keyword, product.descr as descr, product.type as type, product.create_time as createTime, material.`name` as materialName, material.picture as materialPicture, material.spec as materialSpec, pro_activity.activity_type as activity from food_week_menu as t1 left join food_product as product on product.id = t1.product_id left join food_machine_aisle as aisle on aisle.product_id = t1.product_id left join food_machine_pro_activity_ref as pro_activity on pro_activity.mac_id = aisle.mac_id and pro_activity.aisle_id = aisle.id left join food_product_material_rcrt as mr on mr.product_id = t1.product_id left join food_material as material on material.id = mr.material_id where t1.`week` = #{week} and aisle.mac_id = #{macId} and product.`status` = 1 and date_add(product.up_time, interval period day) > now();
